name: Cloud Platformer Multiplayer Fun
description: [Cursor keys] - To Move and Jump [Space] - Use special ability (if you have one) [T] - Safe Chat [X] - Discard power up [R] - Respawn [A] - Achievement list [N] - Toggle Names Other players can hop in and out of the game so if you don't see anyone you just need to wait for someone else to join at the same time. If you are a 'new scratcher' then I'm really sorry to tell you this won't work for you yet (you need to graduate to Scratcher status!) Tip for wall jumping - To wall jump, simply hold up to jump, touch a wall and then pull away STILL HOLDING THE UP KEY :) - Never let it go while wall jumping, that's the secret!!!
